item.description:
4/7/2012 is the annual International Pillow Fight Day (http://www.pillowfightday.com/). Come pillow fight in New Haven! We'll be by the fountain at the lower Green.

We may not start precisely on time, wait for the signal before beginning to fight (we'll have an air horn or whistle or something).

It may last up to... 2 hours or more. It all depends on how things go. Open to all ages. Come as a group "team" if you like.

CAUTION:
* Soft pillows only! Feather pillows are ideal
* Swing lightly, many people will be swinging at once
* DO NOT swing at people without pillows, or with cameras

If you wear glasses, you may wish to take them off and put them in a case or someplace safe.

CLEAN-UP: Please help clean-up after. Bring a bag to put trash in. If you can, bring a broom in case we need them.

Learn more about pillow-fighting here:
http://www.pillowfightday.com/howto

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP

PARKING: Don't forget to feed your meter (if you're parked at one)
item.name: Sat. 4/7 - International Pillow Fight Day
